text: Mangifera parvifolia is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is a tree found in Indonesia, Malaysia, and Singapore. ==References== parvifolia Category:Trees of Malesia Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Anna Koorders-Schumacher Category:Taxa named by Jacob Gijsbert Boerlage
title: Mangifera parvifolia
